title: WTB Colgan's Chips Tins - Mint & Violet

posts.post_title: WTB Colgan's Chips Tins - Mint & Violet
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to pick up a Colgan's Chips Mint tin and a Violet Tin as a birthday present for a friend who is a huge baseball memorabilia collector and also a huge antique medicine, etc... collector (he's a pharmacist and I think these will be right up his alley). Please shoot me a PM if you have anything available. 

Best,

Steve
